snippet.title: Garden Life | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
We are very happy to unveil the first images of Garden Life, our video game in which you'll experience the joy and peace that cultivating your own garden brings.

Enhanced by a warm style and a gameplay close to real life gardening, Garden Life takes you into a soothing world. Surrounded by a comforting visual and audio environment, this game allows you to bring your garden to life by growing authentic plants such as flowers, shrubs and vines.   

Early Access coming in Spring 2023 on Steam!
https://bit.ly/GardenLifeOnSteam

Stay tuned for more info soon!

Follow us:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GardenLifeGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GardenLifeGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gardenlifegame/

-------------------------------
For news about our other games and products, you can also follow us on: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/NaconGaming 
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/NaconGaming 
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/Nacon
